FuncDef: Thets-locationcommand is used (along with an automatic system generated file name) when nofile-urlparameter is provided for theadmin tech-supportcommand. Ifno ts-locationis defined then the operator must provide a file-url with theadmin tech-supportcommand itself.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the destination directory for auto-named tech-support files (when no file-url is specified with the 'admin tech-support' command). The file-url for the ts-location must be a directory (no filename or extension). The root directory (for example, cf1:\) is blocked for local compact flash destinations. A sub-directory (for example, cf2:\tech-support) must be used if local cf is the location. Values-local-url | remote-url|, local-url|[cflash-id/][file-path] 200 chars max, including cflash-id, |directory length 99 chars max each, remote-url |[ftp://login:pswd@remote-locn/][file-path], |247 chars max, |directory length 99 chars max each, remote-locn |[hostname | ipv4-address | "["ipv6-address"]" ], ipv4-address |a.b.c.d, ipv6-address |x:x:x:x:x:x:x:x[-interface], |x:x:x:x:x:x:d.d.d.d[-interface], |x - [0 to FFFF]H, |d - [0 to 255]D, |interface - 32 chars max, for link local addresses, cflash-id |cf1:, cf1-A:, cf1-B:, cf2:, cf2-A:, cf2-B:, cf3:, cf3-A:, cf3-B:.
